data.title: Daniel Clark Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Daniel R. Clark, 80, of rural Evening Shade, Arkansas passed away July 1, 2024 at his home. He was born December 7, 1943 in Oakland, California to Vernon and Florence Hale Clark...
data.text:
Daniel R. Clark, 80, of rural Evening Shade, Arkansas passed away July 1, 2024 at his home. He was born December 7, 1943 in Oakland, California to Vernon and Florence Hale Clark, both who preceded him in death as well as his brother, Rodney.

Daniel was of the Christian faith and enjoyed trout fishing and camping. He had worked as a commercial electrician.

Survivors include his wife, Susie Clark of the home; two sons, Chuck of Tontitown, AR and Brett of Springdale, AR; two daughters, Diane Masteri of Springdale and Ellecia "Ellie" Fowler of Batesville, AR; two step-sons, Fred Wilson of Alexander, AR and Jeffrey Wilson (Barbara) of Fayetteville, AR; two grandchildren, Wyatt and Cash Fowler; two brothers, Troy of Springdale and Terry of Gentry, AR; a sister, Peggy Newberry (Carl) of Fort Worth, TX; many other relatives and friends.

Private services will be at a later date.
